backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, user statistics, and channel status APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping Christian-station features to code files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file summaries describing component responsibilities and features.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document configuring PWA metadata, icons, orientation lock, and app bootstrap.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining icons, metadata, and portrait orientation for the app.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing GPRS‑optimized caching, runtime cache cleanup, and network rules.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring queries, 3D scene, playback UI, PWA prompt, and orientation-lock logic.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Audio player component that manages streaming playback with reconnect logic, volume control, and play/pause handling.
frontend/src/components/BlinkingStars.ts: Renders an animated starfield using three.js with blinking and twinkling effects.
frontend/src/components/DonationModal.ts: Donation modal with crypto addresses and copy-to-clipboard functionality using themed UI blocks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer displaying developer attribution with gradient text styling.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full‑screen loading UI with animated radio icon, bouncing dots, and informational text.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallPrompt: Manages showing and handling the PWA install prompt with deferred events and dismissal logic.
frontend/src/components/RadioPlaybackDis: Displays current station metadata with flag, share, and bookmark handling stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/SearchOverlay.ts: Search overlay component that filters stations by query and displays results with escape-key handling and UI interactions.
frontend/src/components/SpaceScene.tsx: Memoized component that renders a black background and blinking stars for a space-themed scene.
frontend/src/components/StationCounter.t: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Tagline.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/TopToolbar.tsx: Top toolbar providing search, refresh, login, and dashboard controls while managing station refresh and identity state.
frontend/src/components/UserDashboard.ts: User dashboard overlay showing bookmarked stations, channel stats, and escape-key handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, logout, identity persistence, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query utilities and caching layers for fetching global radio stations with memory, localStorage, and IndexedDB caching plus clear functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base layers with extensive CSS variables, global styles, orientation locking, and custom animated title styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/serviceWorkerRegistration.t: Implements service worker registration, validation, update handling, and unregistration for PWA support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Extends Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, and animations mapped to CSS variable–driven theming.
PACKAGING_GUIDE.md: Instructions for creating a ZIP distribution, listing required directories/files and exclusions.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture, features, known issues, and implementation notes for the Gracy FM app.
README.md: Overview of Global FM’s 3D globe radio app with feature list and project description.
SETUP_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Short guide for installing prerequisites and running the app locally.
unknown.txt: Support tips for packaging issues plus a brief project credit.
